original_title: Daniel Barenboim conducts Mahler: Symphony No. 9
overview: Daniel Barenboim conducts the Staatskapelle Berlin in concert in Berlin, Vienna, and New York. Also included is a 22 minute documentary on the musical world of Mahler as seen by Barenboim and Pierre Boulez.
title: Daniel Barenboim conducts Mahler: Symphony No. 9
